mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_NO , E.S_NAME , B.EMP_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , C.JOB_NAME FROM CONTECT A LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN JOB C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN WORK_STATUS_TYPE E ON A.S_CODE = E.S_CODE WHERE B.ENT_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}

SELECT A.EMP_NO , E.S_NAME , B.EMP_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , C.JOB_NAME , B.EMP_ID FROM CONTECT A LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN JOB C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN WORK_STATUS_TYPE E ON A.S_CODE = E.S_CODE WHERE B.ENT_YN = 'Y' AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE (TO_CHAT = #{toChat} AND FROM_CHAT= #{fromChat}) OR (TO_CHAT= #{fromChat} AND FROM_CHAT = #{toChat}) AND ROUND((SYSDATE-TO_DATE(SENDTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24,2) <= 48 ORDER BY SENDTIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT VALUES (SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{message}, #{toChat}, #{fromChat}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
